entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING ENDED, Baker Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:10 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -25.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baker Lake Airport 4:48 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -25.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -42
Dewpoint: -28.6°C
Wind: NNW 47 km/h gust 58 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Blowing snow at times. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:09 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 32 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 32 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:09 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 32.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 32. Wind chill near minus 51. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:09 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023
